channel.title: WebConfs - A blog about web conferences
channel.description: A blog about my favorite web conferences.

item.title: Treehouse Meetups
item.description: This is a post about all the awesome Treehouse meetups out there!

item.title: SassConf
item.description:
SassConf is an awesome conference for front-end developers and designers who love Sass and are passionate about building a better, more beautiful web.

This, year the conference is in Austin, Texas

item.title: Camp Sass
item.description:
Camp Sass is a one-day, one-track Sass conference held in Atlanta, GA. It’s hosted by Hampton Catlin, the inventor of Sass!

At this year’s conference, I had lots of fun, learned a ton, and met many talented web designers and developers.

item.title: Converge
item.description:
Converge assembles some of the best speakers in the undustry to inform and inspire you! It’s for the love of the web and the love of our community. This year’s event includes a full schedule of keynotes, sessions, and wokrshops.

Check it out!
